attributes.action: Capital punishment for convicted pedophiles 11 years old and under.
attributes.additional_details:
Risks of pedophila;
Reoffending is high 
It is becoming normalised on social media and in the national press; then becomes a threat to police, cps, law firms, judges, medical staff and teachers who are innocent and involved as their is no faith or trust.
The industry of pedophila equals to sex trafficking, hostages, drug taking, long term prescriptions, loss of ambition, it ends careers for innocent child protecting roles when under investigation. 
Housing costs to rehouse offenders.
attributes.background: Children that have no sex education or who are legally not allowed to be unsupervised that are subjected to pedophila are at risk of life long illness and self harm. I belive the convicted preparators should face capital punishment. If they have preyed and premeditated to engage in sexual activity.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reinstate capital punishment for those convicted of sexually abusing of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739802
